His mom was the one in the family that dreamed of being an actress but never got that big break. She passed that dream on to her son, who, armed with stunning good looks & charm, forged his way into an acting career. In my humble opinion, I found him to be a very convincing actor with great range. His real handicap was that he refused to move his family to the USA. To emphases this point, this was a time when personal income taxes were very high in Great Britain. That was the reason John Lennon left England. You have to love him for that!
